sentences.english: Now, the stability of the RMB exchange rate still has a firm ground.
sentences.chinese: 现在，人民币汇率的稳定，仍有坚实的基矗。
白金长矗悦来做珠宝饰物。

sentences.english: Himalayan Southwest Chu, Ussuri River north-east side.
sentences.chinese: 喜玛拉雅西南矗，乌苏里江东北边。

sentences.english: Getting the message from the failure, it is the basement of the futural success.
sentences.chinese: 从失败经验中取得了教训，即是将来胜利的基矗。

sentences.english: Not far from the brook stood a frowning rock.
sentences.chinese: 小河不远处矗着一块望夫石。

sentences.english: The models at the fashion looked very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 在时装表演中，模特那看上去非矗漂谅。

sentences.english: We should be clear about our industrial foundation and the agricultural foundation as well.
sentences.chinese: 摸清现实，不仅是工业基础，还有个农业基矗。

sentences.english: Such superiority or inferiority is the objective basis of initiative or passivity.
sentences.chinese: 这种优势或劣势，是主动或被动的客观基矗。

sentences.english: I don't know. I am afraid I will be busy all day long tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我不知点矗我担心我明天一整天都会很杧。
